item.title: By: HUH_YIS
item.dc:creator: HUH_YIS
item.description:
Sometimes I scroll through this sub, the same dumb screenshots, shitposts, website/YouTube shilling, etc. over and over I do this, why? I don’t know, boredom I guess, or self loathing…
Then every once I a while, I come across a post that makes it all worth it.
This is that post
item.content:encoded:
Sometimes I scroll through this sub, the same dumb screenshots, shitposts, website/YouTube shilling, etc. over and over I do this, why? I don’t know, boredom I guess, or self loathing…

Then every once I a while, I come across a post that makes it all worth it.

This is that post

item.title: By: Beachboy78

item.description: I like the texture of the paper.
item.content:encoded: I like the texture of the paper.
